title: You can play these Android games with your Netflix subscription
content:
Back in November 2021, Netflix announced that it would launch a new addition to its mobile app – a gaming section. While the service only started out with a few titles, it has been expanding over time. So what does Netflix’s gaming section have to offer in terms of Android games?

more…

The post You can play these Android games with your Netflix subscription appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Did you know Netflix has free Android games available with a subscription? In fact, there are a few out right now with more to come!
